content: the crossed pathways hat features row of modified crossed stitches alternating with row of double_crochet for a unique design this pattern is perfect for advanced beginner crocheters looking to add a bold accessory to their winter wardrobe finished sizes toddler 16-18 child 18-20 adult 20-22 yarn #4 worsted weight sample used yarnbee soft & sleek hook size i/9 5 5 mm notions yarn needle difficulty adv beginner you will need to be familiar with basic stitches and increases
